resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · Fix: Do not parse formulas in personal notes as waypoint coordinates
 · New: Support extraction of DMS, DegDec and UTM waypoint coordinates out of personal notes
 · New: Implemented new data storage structure
 · New: Allow moving additional geocache data to external SD
 · New: Allow export of owner name to clipboard when clicking on it
 · New: More precise distance / azimuth / projection computations
